xal.tools.coding.json

Class JSONCoder

  • java.lang.Object
    • xal.tools.coding.json.JSONCoder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Coder

    public class JSONCoder
extends java.lang.Object
implements Coder
    encode and decode objects with JSON
